T02D1215=D1606:316a-1: p'i th'a di ni rnna ya /
T02D1215=D1606:316a-3: gnas la sogs pa gtan la dbab pa /
T02D1215=D1606:316a-4: dpal kye'i rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1215=D1606:316a-5: dpal ldan rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i //
T02D1215=D1606:316a-6: zhabs pad dang por rab btud nas //
T02D1215=D1606:316a-7: gnas sogs gtan la dbab pa ni //
T02D1215=D1606:316a-8: mdor bsdus gsal bar bdag gis bri //
T02D1215=D1606:316a-9: de la bcom ldan 'das kyis brtag pa gnyis pa las /
T02D1215=D1606:316a-10: gnas dang nye ba'i gnas dang ni //
T02D1215=D1606:316a-11: zhing dang nye ba'i zhing nyid dang //
T02D1215=D1606:316a-15: dur khrod nye ba'i dur khrod de //
T02D1215=D1606:316a-16: 'di rnams sa ni bcu gnyis so //
T02D1215=D1606:316a-17: sa bcu'i dbang phyug mgon po'o //
T02D1215=D1606:316a-18: 'di rnams gzhan gyis brjod mi bya //
T02D1215=D1606:316a-20: de la gnas zhes pa la sogs pas mdor bstan gsungs so //
T02D1215=D1606:316a-21: 'di rnams zhes pas gnas la sogs pa rnams rab tu dga' ba la sogs pa rnams te /
T02D1215=D1606:316a-22: mos pas spyod pa'i sa dang lhan cig bcu gnyis so //
T02D1215=D1606:316a-23: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ye
T02D1215=D1606:316b-0: shes kyi gnas skabs kyi khyad par ni sa @316b
T02D1215=D1606:316b-1: rnams te / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'
T02D1215=D1606:316b-2: rnams kyis rab tu bsgoms pas lhag par rtogs pa'i
T02D1215=D1606:316b-3: rnams te / phyir ro // de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa /
T02D1215=D1606:316b-4: sa bcu'i dbang phyug byang chub sems dpa' ste //
T02D1215=D1606:316b-5: mgon po ni sangs rgyas so //
T02D1215=D1606:316b-6: 'di rnams gnas la sogs pa rnams kyis brjod par
T02D1215=D1606:316b-7: bya'i gnas la sogs pa las tha dad pa gzhan
T02D1215=D1606:316b-9: gang gi phyir nang gtso bor gyur pas gnas la sogs par gzhag go //
T02D1215=D1606:316b-10: de la sa dang po rab tu dga' ba ni gnas te /
T02D1215=D1606:316b-11: thog ma med pa'i dus nas ma mthong ba'i de
T02D1215=D1606:316b-12: kho na nyid mthong ba'i phyir rab tu dga' ba
T02D1215=D1606:316b-13: mang ba'i phyir dang ting nge 'dzin dang mngon par
T02D1215=D1606:316b-14: shes pa la sogs pa rnams dang sbyin pa'i pha
T02D1215=D1606:316b-15: rol tu phyin pas sems can tshad med pa yang
T02D1215=D1606:316b-16: dag par tshim par byed pa'i rten du gyur pa'i
T02D1215=D1606:316b-17: phyir ro // sa dri ma med pa na /
T02D1215=D1606:316b-18: gnas dang nye bas na nye ba'i gnas te /
T02D1215=D1606:316b-19: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rab kyi
T02D1215=D1606:316b-20: mthar phyin pas dge ba bcu rnam par dag pa'i
T02D1215=D1606:316b-21: phyir dang / ting nge 'dzin dang mngon par shes
T02D1215=D1606:316b-22: pa la sogs pa'i dbang du gyur pa'i phyir ro
T02D1215=D1606:316b-23: phyir dang / // gnas dang nye ba'i gnas dag
T02D1215=D1606:316b-24: phan tshun phan gdags bya dang 'dogs byed kyi 'brel
T02D1215=D1606:316b-25: pa'i sgo nas nye ba yin gyi /
T02D1215=D1606:316b-26: yul dang dus ches nye bas ni ma yin no //
T02D1215=D1606:316b-28: rgyu dang 'bras bu nye bar byed pa ni 'bras
T02D1215=D1606:316b-29: bu skyed par byed pa'i nus pa nyid kyis tha
T02D1215=D1606:316b-30: snyad kyi spyod yul nyid kun 'byung ba'i phyir ro
T02D1215=D1606:316b-31: // phyi rol du gnas dang nye ba'i gnas dag
T02D1215=D1606:316b-32: phan 'dogs pa ni brten pa rnal 'byor ma rnams
T02D1215=D1606:316b-33: phan tshun phan 'dogs pa'i nye bar spyod pa nyid
T02D1215=D1606:316b-34: // las so // de bzhin du zhing dang nye ba'i zhing la sogs par yang rtogs par bya'o //
T02D1215=D1606:316b-35: sa 'od byed pa ni zhing de bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rab kyi mthar phyin pas /
T02D1215=D1606:316b-36: ting nge 'dzin nyams pa med pa la brten pa dang /
T02D1215=D1606:316b-37: chos chen po'i snang ba bskyed pa dang /
T02D1215=D1606:316b-38: mngon par shes pa la sogs pa rab kyi mthar phyin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1215=D1606:316b-40: nye ba'i zhing ste brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu
T02D1215=D1606:316b-41: phyin pa gtso bor gyur pas nyon mongs pa'i bud
T02D1215=D1606:317a-2: ye shes kyi me lce 'phro bar gyur pas byang
T02D1215=D1606:317a-3: chub kyi chos kyi snang ba bskyed pa'i phyir ro
T02D1215=D1606:317a-4: // sa shin tu sbyang dka' ba ni 'dun rtog ste /
T02D1215=D1606:317a-5: 'dun pas don du gnyer bas rang dang gzhan gyi don sgrub pa'i phyir dang /
T02D1215=D1606:317a-6: rtog pa nyid kyis de ltar byed pas rnam par rtog pa'o //
T02D1215=D1606:317a-7: gang gi phyir shin tu sbyad [*spyad?] dka' ba'i sa
T02D1215=D1606:317a-8: la byang chub sems dpa' bsam gtan gyi pha rol
T02D1215=D1606:317a-9: tu phyin pa phul du byung bas /
T02D1215=D1606:317a-10: rdzu 'phrul chen pos thabs sna tshogs pa'i sbyor bas kyang sems can yongs su smin par byed cing /
T02D1215=D1606:317a-11: de nyid sems can yongs su smin pa la mngon par brtson pa dang /
T02D1215=D1606:317a-12: sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i rjes su song ba'i sems kyi
T02D1215=D1606:317a-13: rgyud phyir mi ldog pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rab
T02D1215=D1606:317a-14: tu sbyor bas / khyad par can gyi chos tshol ba la mngon par brtson par byed do //
T02D1215=D1606:317a-15: sa mngon du gyur pa ni nye ba'i 'dun rtog
T02D1215=D1606:317a-16: ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon
T02D1215=D1606:317a-17: du gyur pa'i ngo bos 'dun rtog dang ldan pas
T02D1215=D1606:317a-18: phul du byung ba'i lam dang ldan pa'i phyir ro
T02D1215=D1606:317a-19: // ring du song ba'i sa ni 'du ba ste 'dus shing 'dres par gyur pas na /
T02D1215=D1606:317a-20: 'di ni thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rab tu gyur pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1215=D1606:317a-21: tshad med pa bzhi dang bsam gtan dang rnam par
T02D1215=D1606:317a-22: thar pa dang ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug
T02D1215=D1606:317a-23: pa dang mngon par shes pa la sogs pa rnams
T02D1215=D1606:317a-24: la / mtshan ma dang rtsol ba med par 'dre ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1215=D1606:317a-25: mi g-yo ba'i sa ni nye ba'i 'du ba ste
T02D1215=D1606:317a-26: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'bras bu
T02D1215=D1606:317a-28: mtshan ma dang rtsol ba med par byams pa la
T02D1215=D1606:317a-29: sogs pas sems can dang snod kyi zhing yongs su
T02D1215=D1606:317a-30: dag cing g-yo ba med pa nyid kyis rab tu
T02D1215=D1606:317a-32: sa legs pa'i blo gros ni dur khrod de bdag
T02D1215=D1606:317a-33: med pa nyid kyi dur khrod dang mtshungs pa'i phyir
T02D1215=D1606:317a-34: dang / stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid
T02D1215=D1606:317a-35: kyis byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad bdag med
T02D1215=D1606:317a-36: pa chos kyi dbyings lhag par rtog pa nyid sems
T02D1215=D1606:317a-37: can rnams kyi lhag par rtogs par bya ba'i phyir
T02D1215=D1606:317b-0: dang / ston pa dang / 'khor bar rtsol ba med par sems can gyi don @317b dang ;
T02D1215=D1606:317b-1: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub sgrub par byed pa'o //
T02D1215=D1606:317b-2: chos kyi sprin gyi sa ni nye ba'i dur khrod
T02D1215=D1606:317b-3: de ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid
T02D1215=D1606:317b-4: kyis chos thams cad rang bzhin med pa lhag par
T02D1215=D1606:317b-5: rtogs pa ston pas phul du byung zhing rab kyi
T02D1215=D1606:317b-6: mthar phyin pa grub pas sprin chen po bzhin du
T02D1215=D1606:317b-7: chos kyi char gyis sems can rnams yang dag par
T02D1215=D1606:317b-8: tshim par byed pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1215=D1606:317b-9: de skad du yang kha sbyor thig le las //
T02D1215=D1606:317b-10: gnas ni rab tu dga' ba'i sa //
T02D1215=D1606:317b-11: de bzhin nye gnas dri ma med //
T02D1215=D1606:317b-12: zhing ni 'od byed shes par bya //
T02D1215=D1606:317b-14: /'dun rtog mngon du gyur pa ste //
T02D1215=D1606:317b-15: nye ba'i 'dun rtog sbyang dka' ba'o //
T02D1215=D1606:317b-16: 'du ba ring du song ba ste //
T02D1215=D1606:317b-17: nye ba'i 'du ba mi g-yo ba //
T02D1215=D1606:317b-18: dur khrod legs pa'i blo gros te //
T02D1215=D1606:317b-19: nye ba'i dur khrod chos kyi sprin //
T02D1215=D1606:317b-20: pha rol phyin bcu sa rnams te //
T02D1215=D1606:317b-21: rnal 'byor ma yi kla klo'i skad //
T02D1215=D1606:317b-22: pu yig la sogs gang gsungs pa //
T02D1215=D1606:317b-23: phyi dang nang du rnam bsam bya //
T02D1215=D1606:317b-25: sa 'di rnams kyang byang chub kyi sems kyi rab
T02D1215=D1606:317b-26: tu skye ba de dang der sa bcu gnyis kyi
T02D1215=D1606:317b-27: rang bzhin rgyu dang 'bras nyid kyis 'thung gcod dang
T02D1215=D1606:317b-28: nye ba'i 'thung gcod la sogs par bzhag pa'i dbang
T02D1215=D1606:317b-29: las rtogs par bya'o zhes gsungs so //
T02D1215=D1606:317b-30: de nyid kyi phyir sdom par dkyil 'khor dang lus
T02D1215=D1606:317b-31: la yang 'thung gcod dang nye ba'i 'thung gcod dag
T02D1215=D1606:317b-32: ma bstan to // bh'a wa bha drar ni dur
T02D1215=D1606:317b-33: khrod dang nye ba'i dur khrod nang du 'dus pa
T02D1215=D1606:317b-34: nyid kyis sa dag tu 'gal lo //
T02D1215=D1606:317b-35: sam pu tar legs pa'i blo gros dang chos kyi
T02D1215=D1606:317b-36: sprin dag dur khrod dang nye ba'i dur khrod nyid
T02D1215=D1606:317b-38: de la p'i nga btung ba la'o //
T02D1215=D1606:317b-39: 'thung bar byed do zhes pas las la kve pa ste p'i:'o //
T02D1215=D1606:317b-40: lu n'a ti dge ba sgrub par byed do zhes pas la wa'o //
T02D1215=D1606:317b-41: nyon mongs pa'i phung po 'thung zhing gcod par byed pas na 'thung gcod de /
T02D1215=D1606:317b-42: 'dis ni rab tu dga' ba la sogs pa'i sa
T02D1215=D1606:317b-43: bskyed pa'i rim pas nyon mongs pa spong bar byed
T02D1215=D1606:317b-44: do // bag chags dang bcas pa'i sgrib pa lhag
T02D1215=D1606:317b-45: ma ma lus pa spangs pa ni sa bcu gnyis
T02D1215=D1606:317b-46: pa kun du 'od sangs rgyas kyis nye ba'i 'thung
T02D1215=D1606:318a-1: de ltar ni 'bras bu mtshungs pas pha rol tu
T02D1215=D1606:318a-2: phyin pa bcu'i rang bzhin byang chub kyi rang gi
T02D1215=D1606:318a-3: ngo bo rnams las bcu gnyis kyis ji ltar rigs
T02D1215=D1606:318a-4: par rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi rten du rnam par
T02D1215=D1606:318a-5: gzhag par bya'o // kla klo'i skad ces pa brda'i skad kyis so //
T02D1215=D1606:318a-6: phal cher ni phyi rol gyi 'thung gcod dang gnas
T02D1215=D1606:318a-7: la sogs pa nye ba'i 'thung gcod kyi mthar thug
T02D1215=D1606:318a-8: pa rim pa ji lta ba bzhin mos pas spyod
T02D1215=D1606:318a-9: pa la sogs pa'i dbang phyug gi rnal 'byor ma
T02D1215=D1606:318a-10: rnams 'byung ngo // de skad du dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i rgyud las /
T02D1215=D1606:318a-11: yul dang yul du mngon byung ba //
T02D1215=D1606:318a-12: ye shes ldan pa'i rang skye gnas //
T02D1215=D1606:318a-13: mkha' 'gro ma rnams der bshad pa //
T02D1215=D1606:318a-16: de'i phyir de'i rten byed pa'i grangs la sogs pa rnams dang /
T02D1215=D1606:318a-17: pull'i ra m'a la ya la sogs pa rnams byed pa'i grangs la sogs pa rnams dang ;
T02D1215=D1606:318a-18: nye ba'i sa rnams kyang mos pas spyod pa la
T02D1215=D1606:318a-19: sogs pa'i sa rnams su lhag par mos par bya'o
T02D1215=D1606:318a-20: // zhib tu na phyi'i 'dzin pa bslu bar mos
T02D1215=D1606:318a-21: pa'i ji ltar sems can dman pa la sogs pa
T02D1215=D1606:318a-22: rnams phyi rol gyi yul du zhen pa rigs pa
T02D1215=D1606:318a-23: // bsal ba'i phyir / phyi'i 'thung gcod gnas la
T02D1215=D1606:318a-24: sogs pa rnams mos pas spyod pa la sogs pa'i
T02D1215=D1606:318a-26: de'i phyir 'di thams cad dgongs pa'i skad kyis pu
T02D1215=D1606:318a-27: yig la sogs zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs
T02D1215=D1606:318a-28: te / pu yig la sogs pa ni pull'i ra
T02D1215=D1606:318a-29: m'a la ya la sogs pa phyi rol gyi ga
T02D1215=D1606:318a-30: nas 'chad par 'gyur ba khang pa brtsegs pa'i sa
T02D1215=D1606:318a-31: te / gzhi dang / nang du lus kyi byang chub kyi sems so //
T02D1215=D1606:318a-32: da ni gnas la sogs pa mdor bstan pa brtag pa gnyis pa nyid du nges par bstan pa /
T02D1215=D1606:318a-33: gnas ni dz'a landha rar bshad //
T02D1215=D1606:318a-34: de bzhin ao di ya na nyid //
T02D1215=D1606:318a-35: gnas ni purnna gi ri nyid //
T02D1215=D1606:318a-36: de bzhin k'a ma r'u pa yang ;
T02D1215=D1606:318a-37: / nye gnas m'a la wa ru brjod //
T02D1215=D1606:318a-38: sindhu na ga ra nyid dang //
T02D1215=D1606:318a-39: zhing ni mummu ni ru bshad //
T02D1215=D1606:318a-40: zhing ni byed pa'i brang nyid do //
T02D1215=D1606:318a-41: de w'i ko ta de bzhin zhing //
T02D1215=D1606:318a-42: zhing ni lcags pa'i brang nyid do //
T02D1215=D1606:318a-43: nye zhing ku la t'a ru brjod //
T02D1215=D1606:318a-44: de bzhin aarbu da yang ngo //
T02D1215=D1606:318a-45: go d'a wa r'i gangs kyi ri //
T02D1215=D1606:318b-0: nye ba'i zhing ni @318b mdor bsdus pa'o //
T02D1215=D1606:318b-1: 'dun rtog ha ri ke la dang //
T02D1215=D1606:318b-2: lan tshva'i rgya mtsho'i nang son pa'o //
T02D1215=D1606:318b-3: lamb'a ka dang k'anytsi ka / de bzhin yul 'khor bzang po'o //
T02D1215=D1606:318b-5: 'di rnams ldan pa gling nyid do //
T02D1215=D1606:318b-7: mdor bsdus pas ni mngon par brjod ;
T02D1215=D1606:318b-8: /'thung gcod grong gi mtha' dang ni //
T02D1215=D1606:318b-9: na ga ra yang 'thung gcod do //
T02D1215=D1606:318b-10: tsa ri tra dang ko sha la //
T02D1215=D1606:318b-11: 'bigs byed gzhon nu ma yi grong //
T02D1215=D1606:318b-12: nye ba'i 'thung gcod de dang nye //
T02D1215=D1606:318b-13: rdo rje snying po snying rje che //
T02D1215=D1606:318b-14: dur khrod yi dags 'dus pa dang //
T02D1215=D1606:318b-15: rgya mtsho'i 'gram yang dur khrod do ;
T02D1215=D1606:318b-16: / skyed tshal rdzing bu'i 'gram nyid ni //
T02D1215=D1606:318b-17: nye ba'i dur khrod nges par brjod //
T02D1215=D1606:318b-19: de la kolla gi ri ni p'urnna gi ri'o //
T02D1215=D1606:318b-20: de yang kolla gi ri dang pull'i ra m'a la ya dang /
T02D1215=D1606:318b-21: rdo rje'i gnas zhes pa rnams rnam grangs so //
T02D1215=D1606:318b-23: gnas ni kolla gi ri nyid //
T02D1215=D1606:318b-24: de bzhin aarbu da yang ngo //
T02D1215=D1606:318b-25: zhes bshad pa ma yin nam /
T02D1215=D1606:318b-26: aarbu da gnas su yang bstan pa 'dir nye ba'i zhing du brjod /
T02D1215=D1606:318b-27: de bzhin du k'a ma r'u pa 'dir gnas nyid du bstan /
T02D1215=D1606:318b-28: phyag rgya chen po thig le'i rgyud du yang /
T02D1215=D1606:318b-29: gnas dz'a landha ra dang aoo di ya na dang
T02D1215=D1606:318b-30: p'urnna gi ri dang k'a ma r'u pa yang ngo
T02D1215=D1606:318b-32: de bzhin k'a ma r'u par brjod //
T02D1215=D1606:318b-33: ao tre zhing nyid du yang brjod //
T02D1215=D1606:318b-34: gnas nyid la sogs par rnam par gzhag pa yang thig le dang /
T02D1215=D1606:318b-35: rdo rje mkha' 'gro phal cher mtshungs pa nyid do //
T02D1215=D1606:318b-36: de ci ltar mi 'gal zhe na /
T02D1215=D1606:318b-37: gnas dang nye ba'i zhing dag tsha grang dang dngos
T02D1215=D1606:318b-38: po dang dngos med bzhin du phan tshun 'gal pa
T02D1215=D1606:318b-39: ni ma yin te gcig la yang ming sna tshogs
T02D1215=D1606:318b-42: p'a ta li pu ta dang /
T02D1215=D1606:318b-43: m'a la wa sogs gsum ni nye ba'i zhing du gsungs so //
T02D1215=D1606:318b-45: nye gnas go d'a wa rir brjod //
T02D1215=D1606:318b-46: r'a me shva ra'ang de bzhin no //
T02D1215=D1606:318b-47: de w'i ko ta de bzhin bshad //
T02D1215=D1606:318b-48: m'a la wa yang de bzhin brjod //
T02D1215=D1606:318b-50: phyag rgya chen po thig le las ni /
T02D1215=D1606:318b-51: nye ba'i zhing ni m'a la wa //
T02D1215=D1606:318b-52: na ga ra dang sindhu dang //
T02D1215=D1606:318b-53: sam ham la yang de bzhin no //
T02D1215=D1606:318b-54: de w'i ko ta ba'i mchog sbyin //
T02D1215=D1606:319a-2: 'dir yang de ma thag tu brjod pa nyid yang dag par brjod do //
T02D1215=D1606:319a-3: mummu ni zhes pa mummu ni'i yul lo //
T02D1215=D1606:319a-4: byed pa'i brang zhes pa ka ra ni wad zhing bzhi nges par bstan no //
T02D1215=D1606:319a-5: phyag rgya chen po thig le las ni /
T02D1215=D1606:319a-6: zhing mummu ni dang de w'i ko ta yang ngo ;
T02D1215=D1606:319a-7: / su mmu tar ni sngar bshad pa gnyis so //
T02D1215=D1606:319a-8: sngar bzhin de ltar aarbu da yang zhes pa aurbu da ri'i rtse mo'o //
T02D1215=D1606:319a-9: phyag rgya chen po thig ler yang //
T02D1215=D1606:319a-10: nye ba'i zhing ku la t'a dang aurbu da zhes pa gnyis bshad do //
T02D1215=D1606:319a-11: sampu tar ni nye ba'i zhing tri sha ku ne dang /
